body:
Hey,

So I am gonna take a break from Avicus, actually Minecraft in general.
My parents say that i need to get better scores at school and that a break maybe is good for my health.

SO CONCLUSION: I'm gonna be not that active on That Blockgame for a couple months.

Goodbye for now,
_Dyker :D

title: Gonna take a break...

replies.body: Temp leaving posts aren't allowed :( but I hope you return soon :)
